titles.title: IMPROVE Act of 2009

A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to require provider payments under Medicare and Medicaid to be made through direct deposit or electronic funds transfer (EFT) at insured depository institutions.
IMPROVE Act of 2009
Improving Medicare-Medicaid Payment Policy for Reimbursement through Oversight and Efficiency Act of 2009

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Improving Medicare-Medicaid Payment Policy for Reimbursement through Oversight and Efficiency Act of 2009 or the IMPROVE Act of 2009 - Amends titles XVIII (Medicare) and XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to require provider and supplier payments under Medicare and Medicaid to be made through direct deposit or electronic funds transfer (EFT) at depository institutions that are federally insured or eligibile for federal insurance.
